name: Esse Proxy
storyline:
You will take the role of several characters united by a series of past and future events, each with their own abilities, strengths and weaknesses.

Its world is a dystopian nightmare future plagued with crime where the downtrodden are fodder for the few who hold the real power. The game places players in control of four unique characters, a group of rebels fighting for freedom in a world of oppression and violence. Players will take on gangs, cults, corporations and corrupt governments in an adventure full of violence and tense gameplay.
summary: Blast your way through gangs, corporations, cults, and corrupt governments in a fast-paced, brutal top-down shooter, kill or die, learn and repeat. Located in a dystopian future not so far away, you will witness the conflicts of a group of rebels trying to be free.
